States of Awareness.quote: "Pure awareness transcends thinking. It allows you to step outside the chattering negative self-talk and experience peace." (Deepak Chopra)

Cosmic Consciousness.quote: "The cosmic consciousness is not an accident but an inevitability." (Sri Aurobindo, The Life Divine)

Universal Awareness.quote: "As above, so below; as within, so without." (Hermes Trismegistus)

Divine Perception.quote: "The eye through which I see God is the same eye through which God sees me." (Meister Eckhart)

Spiritual Awakening.quote: "Awakening is not changing who you are, but discarding who you are not." (Deepak Chopra)

Higher Consciousness.quote: "The kingdom of heaven is within you." (Luke 17:21)

Self-Realization.quote: "When I know who I am, I know who all is." (Ramana Maharshi)

Divine Recognition.quote: "He who knows himself knows his Lord." (Islamic Hadith)

Absolute Awareness.quote: "That which permeates all, which nothing transcends and which, like the universal space around us, fills everything completely from within and without, that Supreme non-dual Brahman â€” that thou art." (Sankaracharya)

Enlightened Mind.quote: "The mind is everything. What you think you become." (Buddha)

Unified Awareness.quote: "All things are united in the One Mind." (Zen teaching)

Transcendental Consciousness.quote: "Beyond the changing and the unchanging, beyond existence and non-existence, is the infinite consciousness." (Ashtavakra Gita)

Spiritual Vision.quote: "Blessed are the pure in heart, for they shall see God." (Matthew 5:8)

Divine Knowing.quote: "Knowledge of the self is the mother of all knowledge." (Khalil Gibran)

Expanded Awareness.quote: "The entire universe is within you. Ask all from yourself." (Rumi)

Divine Presence.quote: "Be still and know that I am God." (Psalm 46:10)

Eternal Witness.quote: "I am the witness, the eternal pure consciousness." (Yoga Sutras)

Divine Reflection.quote: "As in a mirror, dimly, but then face to face." (1 Corinthians 13:12)

Infinite Mind.quote: "The divine mind is infinitely more extensive than our finite understanding." (Leibniz)

Supreme Knowledge.quote: "The supreme knowledge is to know that God is." (Ramakrishna)

Divine Intelligence.quote: "Intelligence is the mirror of divine intelligence." (Islamic Philosophy)

Cosmic Mind.quote: "All minds are joined." (A Course in Miracles)

Divine Gnosis.quote: "True knowledge exists in knowing that you know nothing." (Socrates)

Divine Consciousness.quote: "Consciousness is not in the body; the body is in consciousness." (Nisargadatta Maharaj)
